resources.string: Coding new solutions, Engineered to last
Combining passion with coding to bring forth new solutions to everyday problems

The story of the origin of baby shark 
 
 The first time i ever worked as camp leader,it was the craziest 5 minutes of my life. Kids yelling and asking me questions about that i didn't know how to answer.There will days where it went run smoothly be on the water kayaking or on belly boards but then there was days that you had to reach in your bags of tricks to adapt to the changes.I learned over the years those challenging days helped me to become a better leader,team member and a person because only when trapped in a thunderstorm ,some of your greatest idea will come about and change you for better

Beauty is in the Eye of the Beholder \n \n At my time at the AGO ,i had the opportunity to work withe the digital service team who are responsible for maintaining and updating the website but also work with different exhibitions to provide a new viewing experience which was cool seeing combining Art with technology. I was also able to help the team to bring their app alive using React . Cool thing about working at the Ago was being able to see how Tech can help bring the beauty of art in unique ways.

Just Keep Swimming , Just Keep Swimming - Dory \n \n Dory said it the best,always keep swimming.Working Aquatics you hear that phase where you go from swimming my legs trying to become a lifeguard to saying it when i taught swimming lessons . When working in Aquatics,it was all about working as a team and communicating to become stronger and become a unit to solve problems or to overcome unexpected situations . We might be like little fishes in a pond but together we are the strongest group of uniquefishes you will ever meet .
An App that will allow you to find your fav artist and discovery their albums and tracks in a new way created by React Native Release Date : TBH
An Android App that uses GraphQL to fetch and list some of your fav star wars characters by typing in their name in our client version Release Date : June 2020
An Ruby by rails web App that will be our new edition that will showcase our portfolio from projects from the past til now Release Date : June 2020
